tooltip.ancientmagicks.witch_spark: Launches a small magical spark that damages enemies
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fireball: Launches a fiery orb that explodes into flames upon collision
tooltip.ancientmagicks.telekinetic_grab: Pulls targeted dropped items towards you
tooltip.ancientmagicks.collapse: Causes blocks to collapse and start falling around the targeted area
tooltip.ancientmagicks.flight: Grant yourself or target ally the ability to fly or force a target enemy to slowly rise into the air for a brief moment
tooltip.ancientmagicks.dynamite: Summon a lit TNT from thin air
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_skeleton: Summons a subservient Skeleton next to you
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_zombie: Summons a subservient Zombie next to you
tooltip.ancientmagicks.blink: Teleport a short distance towards anywhere you can see
tooltip.ancientmagicks.wind_burst: Causes a sudden burst of wind to blow past you and towards where you're looking at lifting ANYONE caught in it into the air
tooltip.ancientmagicks.slimeball: Launches a slimeball that bounces from walls and other surfaces and damages enemies
tooltip.ancientmagicks.ward: Grant yourself or target ally some momentary damage resistance
tooltip.ancientmagicks.call_lightning: Direct a powerful lightning strike towards where you're looking. The lightning will always hit a surface
tooltip.ancientmagicks.polymorph: Transform a target creature into a harmless sheep. This transformation is not reversible
tooltip.ancientmagicks.chaotic_polymorph: Transform a target creature into another creature chosen RANDOMLY. This transformation is not reversible
tooltip.ancientmagicks.feather_fall: Grant all nearby creatures slower falling speed
tooltip.ancientmagicks.deafening_blast: Causes targeted enemy and all adjacent enemies to drop their weapons
tooltip.ancientmagicks.experience_stream: Channel your experience levels as ammo to fire off a stream of powerful attacks. Damage scales from your experience level
tooltip.ancientmagicks.numb_pain: Numb all pain from target creature or yourself briefly preventing all damage taken. Damage taken is stored and is taken when the effect ends
tooltip.ancientmagicks.alacrity: Hasten yourself or a target ally causing them to do most actions faster momentarily
tooltip.ancientmagicks.spook: Silence all footsteps and prevent non-lethal falling damage for yourself or a target ally
tooltip.ancientmagicks.ghostwalk: Perfectly conceal yourself or a targeted ally hiding all worn equipment and running particles
tooltip.ancientmagicks.ice_wall: Channel a stream of frost to build up walls of ice
tooltip.ancientmagicks.mind_control: Force a target creature to fight for you momentarily
